# 1. Lecture 2

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(AmesHousing)
library(ggplot2)
h<-ggplot(data = ames_raw %>%
            group_by(`Lot Shape`),
          aes(x=`Year Built`,
              y=`SalePrice`))
h<- h + geom_point(aes(color = as.factor(`Lot Shape`)))
h
```
